channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: RI: Robotic Intelligence and the End of Artificiality
item.description: We are not building artificial intelligence. We are sculpting Robotic Intelligenceâ€”real, embodied, and crafted in our image. This post explores why it's time to retire the misnomer of 'AI' and embrace a future where intelligence, whether human or robotic, is seen as sacred, ethical, and divinely reflective.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
